name: Residue Rendezvous
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each damaged hero and ally you control.
flavour: If you happen to come across live specimens, please return here immediately so that we can harvest them for study. - Alchemist Adrianna

name: Reinforced Steel
rules: Ongoing: Friendly armor have +1 [DEF] for each friendly weapon.;Friendly weapons have +1 [COST] for each friendly armor.
flavour: The time has come to bring retribution for the countless souls lost in Lordaeron's fall! - King Varian Wrynn

name: Royal Scepter of Terenas II
rules: When a card enters your resource row, your hero may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Though it is broken and corrupt, you can still make out the royal seal of Lordaeron.

name: Securing the Ramparts
rules:
If you control an armor, item, and weapon:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: We are here to clear a safe landing for our vessels... - Skybreaker Lieutenant

name: Serpent's Nest
rules: Ongoing: When an ability, ally, or equipment enters play under an opponent's control on his turn, you may put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] snake ally token into play.
flavour: A swarm of serpents is truly a sight to behold. - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Terenas Menethil II
rules: This ally enters play with 4 damage.;Mend 2;This ally has +8 ATK while undamaged.
flavour: No king rules forever, my son.

name: Tirion, the Ashbringer
rules: Protector Other [HOLY] allies you control have +X / +X, where X is their cost. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this ally by Scourge heros and allies.
flavour: The hour of justice has come!

name: Windshear Totem
rules: When this card enters play, you may intrerupt target ability.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, this card deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Respite for a Tormented Soul
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward:Put target ally from a graveyard on top of its owner's deck.
flavour: When you face Sindragosa, battle her until she is weakened, and then have your companions use these Crystals to coax the essence that is dormant within her. - Valithria Dreamwalker

name: Phylactery of the Nameless Lich
rules: At the end of your turn, you may put an Unlimited ally from your hand into play if its cost is less then or equal to the cost of an Unlimited ally you control.
flavour: Can you feel the cold hand of death upon your heart? - Sindragosa

name: Path of Life
rules: Put target ally from a graveyard into its owner's resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: The cycle of life is inevitable. - Arch Druid Lilliandra

name: Oathbinder, Charge of the Ranger-General
rules: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero for each ability, ally, and equipment you control.
flavour: Etched in blood across the axe head is one word repeated ten times: SUFFER.

name: Nightmare Ender
rules: On your turn: Destroy this weapon -> Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards
flavour: Ysera grants me the favor to lay these foul creatures to rest! - Valithria Dreamwalker

name: Nexus Link
rules: Ongoing:When you or a friendly player plays a fire or [Fire] card, your hero may deal 1 fire damage to target hero. When you or a friendly player plays a frost or [Frost] card, your hero may deal 1 frost damage to target ally.

name: Mental Focus
rules: Attach to target friendly ally. Ongoing:You and friendly players pay 1 less to play cards, to a minimum of 1.
flavour: In the darkness that surrounds us all, the Light is needed more the ever. - Argent Confessor Paletress

name: Grace of the Lightbringer
rules: Ongoing:If a friendly hero would deal holy (Holy) or melee (Melee) damage, it deals that much +1 instead.
flavour: Long have I struggled to forgive the Prince for his terrible transgressions. - Uther the Lightbringer

name: Halion, Staff of Forgotten Love
rules: If an ally you controlled dealt damage to a hero this turn, you pay 1 less to play cards.
flavour: I'm sorry, Arthas. I can't watch you do this. - Lady Jaina Proudmoore

name: Invincible
rules:
When you place a resource face up, target ally you control has Invincible this turn. (It can't leave play, be targeted, or be dealt damage.)
(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
flavour: Loyal and great of heart in life, may you find peace in death.

name: Assassin's Game
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1 for each opposing exhausted hero, ally, and equipment.
flavour: With every breath you expend, you are one step closer to death. - Lord Jorach Ravenholdt

name: Favor of Acherus
rules: Ongoing: Allies and weapons you control have Assault 1 for each Disease attached to opposing heros.
flavour: We are eternal. We are undyielding. - Highlord Darion Mograine

name: Fel Trade
rules: Destroy any number of allies you control. If you do, search your deck for an ally with cost less than or equal to the combined cost of cards destroyed this way and put into play.

name: Muradin Bronzebeard
rules: At the end of your turn, this ally deals 4 melee damage to each damaged opposing hero and ally.
flavour: If only I'd been able to stop you that day, Arthas, how different things migha' been.

name: Varok Saurfang, High Overlord
rules: Ferocity;When this ally would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it for each damage on him.
flavour: Rise up, sons and daughters of the Horde! LOK'TAR OGAR!

name: Bloodsurge, Kel'Thuzad's Blade of Agony
rules: Once per turn: Put 2 damage on your hero -> If your hero would deal magical (Arcane, Fire, Frost, Holy, Nature, or Shadow) damage this turn, it deals that much +2 instead.
flavour: This world will burn.

name: Deathbringer's Will
rules: When your hero deals combat damage to an opposing hero, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Spirit of Northrend token into play with Ferocity, Stealth, and At end of turn, destroy this ally.
flavour: My boy died at the Wrath Gate. I am here only to collect his body. - High Overlord Saurfang

name: Mithrios, Bronzebeard's Legacy
rules: Dwarves you control have Protector.;At the end of each turn, put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Dwarf Warrior ally token into play.
flavour: FOR THE ALLIANCE AND FOR KHAZ MODAN!

name: Shadowmourne
rules: When this weapon enters play, remove target ally from the game. If you do, add X +1 ATK counters to this weapon, where X was the ATK of that removed ally.
flavour: A newly forged weapon already steeped in this world's history, reborn into an unrivaled destiny. - Highlord Darion Mograine

name: Stormfury, Black Blade of the Betrayer
rules: At the start of your turn, if this weapon has two or fewer Demonic counters on it, add a Demonic counter. This weapon has +1 ATK and costs 1 less to strike for each Demonic counter on it.
flavour: I have known only ages of hate for you. - Illidan Stormrage

name: Windrunner's Heartseeker
rules: Long-Range When this weapon enters play, put two 1 [ATK] / 1 [HEALTH] Undead ally tokens into play. This weapon has +1 ATK for each Undead you control.
flavour: May Azeroth never fail to remember the terrible price we paid for our weakness... for our pride. - Dark Lady Sylvanas Windrunner

name: Pugius, Fist of Defiance
rules: When your hero is dealt damage for the first time each turn, you may add at +1 ATK counter to this weapon.
flavour: In the end, you will all serve me. - The Lich King
